name: Zapper
description: Portfolio tracking, token pricing, and DeFi analytics via x402 micropayments.

endpoints.description: Real-time token pricing and market cap data via x402 micropayment.
Aggregated portfolio totals across networks for any wallet address.
Detailed token balances for a single address across supported networks.
Transaction history with human-readable interpretations for any address.
DeFi balances including liquidity pools and yield farming positions.

name: AgentUtil

Timezone-aware business hours and holiday information for scheduling.

Latest crypto headlines aggregated from RSS feeds.
